summary: The module provides a JupyterHub authenticator that integrates MediaWiki’s OAuth service. It implements custom login and callback handlers to drive the OAuth handshake, exchange tokens, maintain session state, and resolve the authenticated user’s identity. A concrete authenticator class ties these pieces together, while utility functions handle JSON serialization and deserialization.
business_intent: Enable JupyterHub installations to authenticate users via a MediaWiki identity provider, offering single sign‑on for wiki users accessing Jupyter notebooks.
